projects.description: Explore the enchanting world of Disney with our Random Disney Quote Generator! Click for a sprinkle of wisdom or a dose of nostalgia, as beloved Disney characters share their magical words. Let the joy of randomness transport you to the heartwarming universe of Disney storytelling.

'Data Pagination and Filtering' project easily filters through a list of individuals and navigate with pagination, providing a user-friendly experience. Effortlessly organize and explore your data, making information retrieval a breeze.

In this project, I used JavaScript to enhance an interactive registration form for a fictional Full Stack conference. This project validates user input and provides helpful error messages whenever the user enters invalid information into the form fields.
This project is a browser-based, wording guessing game 'Phrase Hunter' that allows users to select a random, hidden phrase, which a player tries to guess by clicking letters on the onscreen keyboard.

In another world, I built an app for a fictional company called Awesome Startup. They needed a smart way for employees to share contact information with each other. I used a 'Random User Generator' API to grab information for 12 random employees, and use the data to build a prototype for an Awesome Startup employee directory
